comment._content:
WILL YOU DONATE MONEY OR TIME TO US  SO WE MAY START
 A NEW HOMELESS  Shelter ,called WE RISE..... The people in portland,oregon needs your help SEE THE PICS  OF THE HOMELESS WE ALL POSTED UP A SHELTER FOR COUPLES AND SINGLES LIKE DIGNITY VILLAGE......... Staff needed also.... Grant writer secretary fund raiser ect.
If you build it they will come. I let 2 men and one lady live in my room to get them off the streets, i do not have a shelter but iv sheltered 3 people out of the goodness of my hart. With great power comes great responsibility. I am the next dr. Mlk civil rights activist fighting for the rights of the homeless to get off the streets and in to shelter ,a job and a home, many are called few are chosen....... 503 208-3041
8957 s.e. division,st. portland,oregon 97266 SEAN T. TELL IS  MY NAME
